type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Reference to Phase Node Missing

definition.text: The Move To Phase Event Node where this error poped up is expected to reference a Phase Node so that when all conditions are met, the LF Trading Bot can swith to the referenced Phase.

paragraphs.text: This error happens when the conditions to switch phases are met but the LF Trading Bot cannot find a reference to the Phase where it should switch to.
To fix this, simply establish a reference from this Node to a Phase node.
